content:
179 
 
      
  
UTME  
(i) ABU, NFI -DEG, BOWEN, PLASU, KSU and IBADAN 
require five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Literature in English and other 
subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.  
(ii) ABUJA requires five (5) credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics,  Literature in English and 
any other two (2) subjects.  
(iii) BENIN requires LiteratureinEnglish and one (1) Arts 
subject.  
(iv) FED-OYE EKITI requires five (5) ‘O’ level credits 
passes including English Language and Literature in 
English and a pass in Mathematics.  
(v) ILORIN accepts ABRSM Grade V and above (Music 
Theory) or equivalent certificate in lieu of ‘O’ level 
credit pass in Literature in English.  
(vi) JOS, Fine Arts is not compulsory.  
(vii) KWASU, JOS, UYO, BSU, IMSU, CALABAR and DELSU 
require ‘O’ level credit pass in Literature in English.   
(viii) LASU, UNIZIK and ILORIN accept five (5) 'O' level 
credit passes to include English Language and 
Literature inEnglish plus any other Arts/Social 
Science subjects.    
(ix) NDU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, L iterature in English and any 
other three (3) subjects, two (2) of which must be 
Arts subjects.  
(x) OAU requires Five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Literature in English plus one (1) 
Arts subject and any other two (2) subjects.  
(xi) OOU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Literature in English and 
Arts subjects.  
 
REQUIREMENTS
